fields.name: VlanID
fields.tag: json:"vlan_id" gorm:"not null;unique_index:vlan_id_port_id" sql:"type:integer references vlans(id)" clay:"many_to_many_left_resource_name=vlans"

fields.name: PortID
fields.tag: json:"port_id" gorm:"not null;unique_index:vlan_id_port_id" sql:"type:integer references ports(id)" clay:"many_to_many_right_resource_name=ports"

sql_after_migration: create trigger if not exists DeleteVlanPortAssociationBeforeVlanDeletion before delete on vlans
delete from vlan_port_associations where vlan_id = old.id;
create trigger if not exists DeleteVlanPortAssociationBeforePortDeletion before delete on ports
delete from vlan_port_associations where port_id = old.id;
